name: Eat and Run!
description:
Avoid unhealthy food to avoid gaining weight, but make sure to eat the healthy food to lose weight and run even faster! Don't forget the dog who's chasing you, but it's okay! Eat even more healthy food to get into super action and continue without worry! Smash through obstacles using the super mode to get yourself an advantage over the dog!
Features include:
-Male and female characters to select from
-Super mode to smash obstacles
-Gain and lose weight
-Many obstacles
-And many different level sceneries!
Play our game to lose and win games, and to gain and shed weight! Eat and Run, it's the newest fever there is!
